name: Crazy Bomb
description:
You’re in control of a bomb that came to life through the power of… violence. Your objective is to destroy as many objects (box, cart, chest. etc.) before your wick extinguish along with your life.

The player will be able to move around the scene (left arrow and right arrow) and Jump (Space bar) .

Made as part of a diploma in video game design and development in Arkde - Colombia.
